opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ZAGREB, BUKOVAC, 246 m2, 4-sobna Prodaje se kuća u izgradnji s očekivanim useljenjem sredinom 2025.godine. Kuća se nalazi na Gornjem Bukovcu. Površina kuće iznosi 246 m2 s obračunatim koeficijentima dok stambena površina kuće iznosi 150 m2. Kuća se sastoji od 3 etaže; - PODRUM površine 51 m2 - garaža za minimalno dva automobila, sauna, teretana - PRIZEMLJA površine 126 m2 - dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, predprostor, degažman, wc, terasa s vrtom - 1. KATA površine 70 m2 - master spavaća soba s walk-in ormarom te kupaonicom s wc-om, dvije spavaće sobe s vlastitim kupaonicama, hodnik Kuća će biti nisko energetska (Energetski razred A+), opremljena kvalitetnim materijalima kao što je hrastov parket, vrhunska sanitarija i keramika te aluminijska stolarija s troslojnim staklima. Sustav grijanja/hlađenja su dizalice topline te dodatno i podno grijanje. Kuća posjeduje minimalno 2 garažna parkirna mjesta. Vrhunska lokacija okružena zelenilom idealna je oaza za miran obiteljski život. U neposrednoj blizini nalazi se autobusna stanica, trgovine, škola i vrtić. *Na fotografijama(renderima) je prikazano idejno rješenje unutarnjeg uređenja kuće te postoji mogućnost da se isto napravi uz nadoplatu. U navedenu cijenu uračunato je uređenje po principu ključ u ruke. HOUSE FOR SALE, ZAGREB, BUKOVAC, 246 m², 4 Rooms A house under construction is for sale, with expected completion by the middle of 2025. The house is located in Gornji Bukovac. The total area of the house is 246 m² (with coefficients applied), while the living area is 150 m². The house consists of 3 floors: - BASEMENT (51 m²): garage for at least two cars, sauna, gym. - GROUND FLOOR (130 m²): living room with kitchen and dining area, entrance hall, hallway, toilet, terrace with a garden. - FIRST FLOOR (70 m²): master bedroom with a walk-in closet and bathroom, two additional bedrooms with their own bathrooms, hallway. The house will be energy-efficient (Energy Class A+), equipped with high-quality materials such as oak parquet flooring, premium sanitary ware and ceramics, and aluminum windows with triple glazing. The heating/cooling system includes heat pumps and underfloor heating. The house has at least two garage parking spaces. Located in a prime area surrounded by greenery, it is an ideal oasis for peaceful family living. Nearby, you’ll find a bus stop, shops, a school, and a kindergarten. The photos (renders) show a conceptual design of the house’s interior, which can be implemented for an additional fee. The listed price includes a "turnkey" option.
